definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions

sentences.english: Diluted earnings per common share of $0.55
sentences.chinese: 普通股攤薄後每股盈利爲55美分。

sentences.english: Minority shareholders will also be offered ordinary shares, at 1p.
sentences.chinese: 小股東們也將提供每股1便士的普通股。

sentences.english: Sina said it would issue 47m new ordinary shares to Focus Media shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 新浪表示，將向分衆傳媒股東增發4700萬普通股。

sentences.english: There is no potential dilutive ordinary shares in issue during both periods.
sentences.chinese: 於期內本集團並沒有潛在攤薄普通股編制。

sentences.english: Thereafter, the remaining assets shall be distributed ratably to the holders of the Common Stock.
sentences.chinese: 之後，剩餘的資產將由普通股股東按比例分配。

sentences.english: Thereafter, the remaining assets shall be distributed ratably to the holders of the Common Stock.
sentences.chinese: 之後，虧損的資產將由普通股股東按比例分配。

sentences.english: Investing in the equalities of public corporations.
sentences.chinese: 投資於公共公司的普通股。

sentences.english: Its returns for the investment depend on the payout ratio of the corporation.
sentences.chinese: 普通股的投資回報取決於發行股票的公司的派息率。

sentences.english: After five years, any remaining preferred shares would convert to common shares.
sentences.chinese: 五年後，任何剩餘的優先股將轉換爲普通股。

sentences.english: The notes can be converted to common stock or cash in 2016.
sentences.chinese: 這些權證可以在2016年換成普通股或者現金。

sentences.english: Avis announces secondary offering of its common stock.
sentences.chinese: 阿維斯宣佈二次發行的普通股。

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Cun2 tuo1 Ping2 zheng4

definition: to undertake to purchase sth/to subscribe (to share issue)
to ration merchandise (esp. food in times of shortages)
consideration (in exchange for shares)/a quid pro quo
